subject: Football
Hurricane Katrina
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A year ago, the New Orleans Saints started 3-0 in what became an inspiring season that ended one game short of the Super Bowl. This year, the Saints exist in Bizarro World.
snippet: A year ago, the New Orleans Saints started 3-0 in what became an inspiring season that ended one game short of the Super Bowl. This year, the Saints exist in Bizarro World.
